trans-unit.source: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um método que quando implementada, um local de latitude/longitude é resolvido para um endereço civil.

trans-unit.source: To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Para resolver um <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>para um <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>assincronamente, implementar <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>e fornecer os dados de endereço civil para o <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>evento.</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> </xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Resolve um <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para um civil endereço sincronicamente.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: O local da latitude/longitude para resolver para um endereço.

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Resolve um <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> para um civil endereço sincronicamente.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para resolver um local de latitude/longitude para um endereço.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: O local da latitude/longitude para resolver para um endereço.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous request using <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*> to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma solicitação assíncrona usando <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*>para resolver uma latitude/longitude para um endereço civil é concluída.</xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync*>
